message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product which I believe will be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $9,500, which I feel reflects its worth.  What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,500. I believe that's a fair price considering its worth to me.
Bob, I understand your position, but $7,500 is significantly below its true value. I'm willing to come down a bit, how about $9,000?
I appreciate your willingness to come down, but $9,000 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so how about $8,250?
